refnamediv.refpurpose: convert SVC files to FSM format (DEPRECATED)

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &svc2fsm; tool converts a state space in the SVC format in &infile; to the FSM format and writes the result to &outfile;. If &outfile; is not supplied, stdout is used.

Note that tools that use the FSM format may depend on state information and parameter names. The former requires that the state information is in the SVC file and the latter that the &opt_l; option is used (see the options sections below).
This tool is based on the &svc2fsm; tool of Huub van de Wetering as found in the mCRL toolset. It has been extended to support SVC files generated by &lpe2lts; and new visualisation tools.
